DetailWhenShipContent1: Usually all orders are processed and shipped within 24 hours.
DetailWhenShipContent2: order ship within 24 hours. After execute an order, we will send tracking number by e-mail, and providing inquiry addresses.
DetailCanShipTitle: Can you ship to my country?
DetailCanShipContent: we can ship to your country.we can ship single item samples or large orders to more than 100 countries.
DetailEasyReturnsContent: We are committed to your total satisfaction. If, for any reason, you are not associated tax, within 365 business days of receipt of the item(s). To receive either a credit toward an exchange or a credit on your charge account, please note that all returns and exchanges must be in new, unused or unworn condition with the original tags and stickers attached. Items deemed worn, used, dirty or missing tags will be returned to purchaser at their expense and no refund will be issued. Women''swimwear is eligible for return only if the sanitary liner is place. Underwear, Customized and personalized items are not returnable. Since lost return shipments are the responsibility of the customer, be sure to obtain a tracking number from the courier for the return shipment.
ShippingPaymentMethodHint: Visa Card, Master Card, Debit Card, JCB, American Express
paymentCvvMsg1: Visa, Mastercard, Discover 3 Digit Card Verification Number
paymentCvvMsg2: For your safety and security, we require that you enter your card''s verification number.
paymentCvvMsg3: The verification number is a 3-digit number printed on the back of your card. It appears after and to the right of your card number.
paymentCvvMsg4: American Express 4 Digit Card Verification Number
paymentCvvMsg5: For your safety and security, we require that you enter your card''s verification number.
paymentCvvMsg6: The American Express verification number is a 4-digit number printed on the front of your card. It appears after and to the right of your card number.
PaymentResultFail2: We are really sorry that the payment delayed when you paid by VISA. But please wait and don''t worry, a confirmation email will be sent to you once the order is successfully paid.
PaymentResultFail3: Or you can surely try to pay by MasterCard and if the MasterCard payment succeeds, we will cancel your VISA payment and guarantee you only pay successfully once for one order.
AboutUsDesc1: As a responsible company, we will do everything we can to ensure the safety of purchase, for which we use a variety of security technologies to protect the information security, non-disclosure. What we have done is to bring happy shopping as well as secure shopping.
AboutUsDesc2: Our representative of customer service will be delighted to assist you in finding and fitting the correct products all day online. Once your order is completed, you will receive the confirmation email in 1 hour. As for other inquiries email, we will reply in 12 hours.
AboutUsDesc3: Your satisfaction is what we are strived for. So we offer 15-day satisfaction guaranteed return policy. More details, please refer to Return Policy.
AboutUsDesc4: The products are from factory directly, which not only reduce the costs, but make quality guaranteed. We also insist no minimum order, but better goods and service.
AboutUsDesc5: Credit card as one of the most convenient payment methods will also bring more safety for the purchase.
AboutUsDesc6: No matter where you are, you don't have to pay the tax. In the unlikely event that you are required to pay, you can provide the receipt of the tax invoice to our customer service. Then we will solve it for you.
ConditionsDesc1: Welcome to onlineshop, your reliable online marketplace. Please review the following basic rules that govern your use of the our onlineshop (the 'Agreement'). Please note that your use of the our onlineshop (the 'Site') constitutes your unconditional agreement to follow and be bound by these Terms of Use. Although you may 'bookmark' a particular portion of this Site and thereby bypass this Agreement, your use of this Site still binds you to these Terms of Use.our onlineshop reserves the right to update or modify these Terms of Use at any time without prior notice to you. Your use of the Site following any such change constitutes your unconditional agreement to follow and be bound by these Terms of Use as changed. For this reason, we encourage you to review these Terms of Use whenever you use this Site.
ConditionsDesc2Line1: All billing and registration information provided must be truthful and accurate. Providing any untruthful or inaccurate information may constitute a breach of these Terms of Use. By confirming your purchase at the end of the checkout process, you agree to accept and pay for the item(s) requested.
ConditionsDesc2Line2: All materials, including images, text, illustrations, designs, icons, photographs, programs, music clips or downloads, video clips and written and other materials that are part of this Site (collectively, the 'Contents') are intended solely for personal, non-commercial use. You may download or copy the Contents and other downloadable materials displayed on the Site for your personal use only. No right, title or interest in any downloaded materials or software is transferred to you as a result of any such downloading or copying. You may not reproduce (except as noted above), publish, transmit, distribute, display, modify, create derivative works from, sell or participate in any sale of or exploit in any way, in whole or in part, any of the Contents, the Site or any related software. All software used on this Site is the property of our onlineshop. and protected by copyright laws. The Contents and software on this Site may be used only as a purchasing resource. Any other use, including the reproduction, modification, distribution, transmission, republication, display, or performance, of the Contents on this Site is strictly prohibited.

ConditionsDesc9: Please note that there may be certain orders that we are unable to accept and must cancel. We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to refuse or cancel any order for any reason. Some situations that may result in your order being canceled include limitations on quantities available for purchase, inaccuracies or errors in product or pricing information, or problems identified by our credit and fraud avoidance department. We may also require additional verifications or information before accepting any order. We will contact you if all or any portion of your order is canceled or if additional information is required to accept your order.
ConditionsDesc10: While our onlineshop strives to provide accurate product and pricing information, pricing or typographical errors may occur. our onlineshop cannot confirm the price of an item until after you order. In the event that an item is listed at an incorrect price or with incorrect information due to an error in pricing or product information, our onlineshop shall have the right, at our sole discretion, to refuse or cancel any orders placed for that item. In the event that an item is mis-priced,our onlineshop may, at our discretion, either contact you for instructions or cancel your order and notify you of such cancellation.
ConditionsDesc11: The Sellers shall not be held responsible for the delay in shipment or non-delivery of the goods due to war, earthquake, serious flood, fire and other Force majeure causes agreed by both parties. However, the Sellers shall advise the Buyers by fax/telex, immediately of such occurrence and within fourteen days thereafter, shall send by airmail to the Buyers for their acceptance a certificate issued by the competent authorities of the place where the accident occurs as evidence thereof. Under such circumstances the Sellers, however, are still under the obligation to take all necessary measures to hasten the delivery of the goods. In case the late delivery exceeds ten weeks, the Buyers shall have the right to cancel this Contract.
ConditionsDesc12: Where the parties fail to settle dispute within 30 days after such dispute occurs, they agree to submit such dispute to China International Economic and Trade Arbitration Commission for arbitration which shall be conducted in accordance with the Commission's arbitration rules in effect at the time of applying for arbitration. The arbitral awards are final and binding upon both parties.
ShippingReturnsDesc1Line1: General goods: In 24 hours once the order is confirmed.
ShippingReturnsDesc1Line3: Once the package is ready, our logistics department will professionally choose the fast and convenient way to ship out according to your destination. At the same time, you can use the link of third party shipping system which we will provide in email once the package is out to follow up your order.
ShippingReturnsDesc2: In general, the delivery time is about 5-8 business days. However different countries, the time might be a little different. Please pay attention to the shipping information in shipping system. Any problems, please contact us.
ShippingReturnsDesc3Line1: We use the third party shipping system to help you access to your delivery information.
ShippingReturnsDesc3Line2: You only need to fulfill the blanks with the same information you used when you placed the order, you can access to the shipping information.
PrivacyDesc1: Our site respects the privacy of our visitors/customers, which is extremely important to us. To better serve you and to make you understand how your information is used on our site, we have explained our privacy policy below.
PrivacyDesc2: We believe it's important for you to know what types of information we collect. The information includes your Email, Name, Business Name, Street Address, Post Code, City, Country, Telephone Number, Password and so on.
PrivacyDesc3: During registration, our system will only keep your account, password and email. When you create the order, the shipping and contact information will be provided. If we encounter a problem when processing your order, we may use the personal information you provide to contact you.
PrivacyDesc4: Your email is used to register and place order online. And it will also receive our promotional notice when we bring new products. Of course, you can also unsubscribe the promotional notice.
PrivacyDesc5Line1: - Help us make the site easier for you to use and don't need to enter information again.
PrivacyDesc5Line2: - Help you quickly locate information, products, and services.
PrivacyDesc5Line3: - Help us create content on this site that is most relevant to you.
PrivacyDesc5Line4: - Alert you to new information, products, and services.
PrivacyDesc6: We will not sell (or trade or rent) your personally identifiable information to other companies. We also use the latest in encryption technology to ensure the information safe. And all employees that we hire have to sign a confidentiality agreement that forbids them from disclosing any information to other individuals or entities.
